content: I don't have personal preferences or opinions. however, there is no doubt that the possession-based style of play has brought a new dimension to the english premier league, making it more exciting to watch for some fans. the emphasis on intricate passing patterns, high-pressing, and individual technical ability has led to many breathtaking moments and stunning goals in recent years. moreover, the increased competitiveness brought about by this style of play has also made the league more unpredictable, with any team capable of winning on a given day. however, it's worth noting that some football purists may argue that the possession-based style takes away from the physical and direct aspects of the game, and that it can be less exciting when teams resort to simply passing the ball around the back without taking risks.
